meanings.definition: Relating to or characteristic of the plant genus Datura.
meanings.sent1: The daturic flowers bloomed beautifully in the garden.
meanings.sent2: The garden was filled with the daturic scent of the Datura plants.
meanings.sent3: The daturic plants seemed to dance in the wind, showing off their unique beauty.
meanings.sent4: Her dress flowed around her like daturic petals in the breeze.
meanings.sent5: The daturic essence of the garden lingered in the air, enchanting all who passed by.

meanings.definition: Containing or resembling the alkaloids found in plants of the genus Datura.
meanings.sent1: The tea had a daturic taste that reminded me of the Datura plant.
meanings.sent2: The potion had a daturic effect on those who drank it.
meanings.sent3: The daturic flavor of the soup surprised everyone at the table.
meanings.sent4: His words had a daturic impact on her, leaving her in a dreamlike state.
meanings.sent5: The daturic properties of the medicine helped alleviate her pain.
